description: Verify that the test execution reports page loads correctly with proper authentication and comprehensive data display
scenario: Admin user navigates to view comprehensive test execution reports and analytics
expected_results: Display the reports page with summary statistics, module-wise results, recent executions, failed tests analysis, and export options
procedure:
1. Log in as admin user
2. Navigate to /admin/system-test/reports
3. Verify page loads with title 'Test Execution Reports'
4. Check comprehensive analysis subtitle is displayed
5. Verify all main sections are present: summary statistics, module results, recent executions, failed tests, and report info

description: Verify that non-admin users cannot access the test execution reports functionality
scenario: Regular user attempts to access test execution reports directly
expected_results: Access should be denied with 403 Forbidden error for non-admin users
procedure:
1. Log in as regular user (non-admin)
2. Attempt to navigate to /admin/system-test/reports
3. Verify 403 Forbidden error is returned
4. Check redirect to appropriate error page
5. Ensure no reports interface is accessible

description: Verify complete test execution reports and analytics workflow from access through data export
scenario: Admin completes comprehensive reports review including analysis, navigation, and export functions
expected_results: Complete reports workflow provides comprehensive test execution analytics with actionable insights and export capabilities
procedure:
1. Navigate to reports from admin dashboard
2. Review summary statistics for overall test health
3. Analyze module-wise results to identify problem areas
4. Review recent test execution trends
5. Investigate failed tests requiring attention
6. Navigate to specific test plans for detailed review
7. Use action buttons to re-execute or edit failed tests
8. Export reports in DOCX format for documentation
9. Export JSON data for further analysis
10. Print reports for physical archival
11. Verify all data is accurate and current
12. Confirm seamless integration with test management workflow and proper tracking of all analytics data

description: Verify the page header displays correct title and provides proper navigation options
scenario: Admin views reports page header to understand context and access navigation options
expected_results: Display header with title, description, and navigation buttons including back to dashboard and export options
procedure:
1. Navigate to reports page
2. Check title shows 'Test Execution Reports'
3. Verify description shows 'Comprehensive analysis of test execution results'
4. Confirm 'Back to Dashboard' button navigates to dashboard
5. Check export buttons are present (DOCX, JSON, Print)
6. Verify proper styling and fade-in animation

description: Verify proper display when no test data is available
scenario: Admin views reports page when no test modules or recent executions exist
expected_results: Display appropriate messages and icons for empty data states
procedure:
1. Test with empty modules summary data
2. Verify 'No test modules found' message with inbox icon
3. Test with no recent executions
4. Check 'No recent test executions found' message with calendar-x icon
5. Confirm failed tests section is hidden when no failed tests exist
6. Verify empty states have proper styling and spacing
